item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Taking out the 25% of Americans that didn't read a book last year {washington post article), the average amount of books read by our fellow Americans is about 9. If you attended every book club discussion this year and read every book you would end up with 12 books read for the year. If you were really good and read both books you would have read 24 books.

Wow! Congratulations!

Please consider joining us for the end of year celebration.
item.name: End of Year Party
